content.rendered:
Austin has a BA from New York University and a MBA from the University of Cambridge.

Austin joined Regent College London as a Lecturer in 2019, prior to which he tutored students on full bursaries at highly selective universities in the UK and US.

Austin facilitates students’ educational and employability journeys via highly interactive and relevant lectures.  He leverages his 13 years’ experience in property investment during which he worked for a large property developer in Boston (US) then acquired and redeveloped a London property portfolio which he currently manages.
